Package Entities

Class Booking

java.lang.Object
Entities.Booking
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
MovieGoerCheckBooking
public class Booking extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a movie booking. A booking can be made by one movie-goer. A booking can contain one to many tickets.
See Also:
